channel.title: observability on Cray System Management (CSM)
channel.description: Recent content in observability on Cray System Management (CSM)

item.title: Install and Upgrade Observability Framework
item.description: Install and Upgrade Observability Framework Overview The Install and Upgrade Observability Framework collects Goss test health check results and presents them in a visual Grafana dashboard, providing key insights into the health of the system. The automated Time to Install (TTI) and Time to Upgrade (TTU) features provide the time and other important details for each portion of the CSM install, such as when and on what machine a given command was run.
